biotools.summary: mspack is a C++ program for lossless and lossy mass spectrometry data compression, achieving a high compression ratio without sacrificing performance. It includes an example implementation for mzXML and mzML as well as a format-agnostic API.

bioschemas.name: mspack
bioschemas.summary: mspack is a C++ program for lossless and lossy mass spectrometry data compression, achieving a high compression ratio without sacrificing performance. It includes an example implementation for mzXML and mzML as well as a format-agnostic API.
